name: Wyvern Tor
description: Prominent crag visible for 20 miles. Former wyvern nest (cleared years ago). Now occupied by orc scouts.
atmosphere: Rugged hill. Smell of smoke. Ravine with cave at base.
tactics: Orcs fight until Brughor dies, then flee. Ogre fights to death.
finding_camp: DC 15 Perception or DC 10 Survival per hour searching
treasure: Chest in cave: 750 cp, 180 sp, 62 ep, 30 gp, 3 vials perfume (10 gp each)
